item.title: cv
item.description:
Basic information

  • Name: Xiaoxuan TANG

  • Gender: Male

  • Age: 24

  • Nationality: Chinese

Contact me

  • Email: crayontxx@live.com or xiaoxuant@student.unimelb.edu.au

  • Phone: 0402844028

Education background

  • Master
    • University of Melbourne
    • Master of Engineering(software engineering)
    • 2014 - 2016(expected)
  • Bachelor
    • Shanghai Jiaotong University
    • Bachelor of Engineering(software engineering)
    • 2009 - 2013

Intern experience

  • iOS engineer at IntSig Information Co., Ltd

    • participated in the process of design and developing an chat app on iOS
    • this is the place where I systematically approached to iOS
    • Nov 2012 - May 2013

  • R&D engineer at Digiwin Soft

    • participated in the development process of an ERP product
    • gained a practical understanding about web app design
    • gained some experience in using some JS frameworks, such as Sencha
    • May 2013 - Jul 2013

Work experience

  • iOS engineer at Massvig Ltd.,Co, Shanghai
    • took charge of the development and maintenance of e-commerce iOS apps
    • developed some static library for specific requirement
    • Aug 2013 - Jun 2014

Product

  • Justyle

    • iOS e-commerce app.
    • completed during my full-time job

  • Zouqi indoor guide

    • iOS indoor guide app integrated with O2O thought
    • taking advantage of iBeacon for guide
    • completed alpha version during my full-time job

  • Shanghai Young Entrepreneur Information Exchange Platform

    • an iOS app for that platform
    • an outsourcing project with 2 other people

and more…

Project

  • Shift

    • an Windows Phone 7 game for Microsoft Imagine Cup
    • completed during Bachelor course
    • working with 2 other classmates

  • Wikipedia on Android

    • an Android app for access to Wikipedia
    • it is a individual summer school project during Bachelor course

  • and other non-mobile project…

What is more

I am a person with much interest in computer, with the ability of self-motivation and self-driven. My aim is to become not only an excellent mobile engineer, but a full stack engineer as well.
